events.title: TIFF MEETS TECH - Hollywood in Toronto!
events.body: OMERS Ventures and OneEleven host the third annual Founders & Film Summer Social at Brassaii during the opening night of the Toronto International Film Festival.

events.title: World Blockchain Forum
events.body: Join visionary leaders, economic pioneers and enterprising investors from around the world as they discuss the future of our financial world at Keynote’s biggest blockchain industry influencer event.

events.title: OpenBazaar meet and greet (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Zcash)
events.body: A few OpenBazaar contributors are getting together at Queen Anne Beerhall to meet the community, share ideas, have drinks and chat about cryptocurrencies and dapps.

events.title: Consensus
events.body: CoinDesk presents the 4th annual blockchain technology summit, May 14 - 16, 2017.

events.title: Crypto Is Currency Day
events.body: We believe in people being able to buy products and services in a secure, private, decentralized, and uncensored way, from anywhere in the world, using money that shares their values. This September we will show the world the true value of Crypto AS currency, because Crypto IS Currency. Join us on September 29th!

events.title: Challenging Amazon: Why We Need a Peer to Peer Market Place – Brian Hoffman
events.body: OB1 CEO, Brian Hoffmann, will talk about why we need a true peer to peer market place, what OpenBazaar is and it’s potential to disrupt traditional ecommerce on the web through privacy and freedom.

events.title: Consensus
events.body: CoinDesk presents the 3rd annual blockchain technology summit, May 22-24, 2017 at the New York Marriott Marquis.
